original_text: He also told them a parable: “Can a blind man lead a blind man? Will they not both fall into a pit?
korean_text: 또 비유로 말씀하시되 맹인이 맹인을 인도할 수 있느냐 둘이 다 구덩이에 빠지지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: He also told them a parable:
Can a blind man lead a blind man?
Will they not both fall into a pit?
